title: Panacea - The Documentary
brief_description: Panacea the Documentary follows the journey of Arena Theatre Company’s creative team as they embark on an ambitious large scale perfromance event fusing modern technology and cinematic devices. We follow the journey of the team as they wrestle with combining conventional theatre and MTV culture.
